For more information, visit bloomboard.com.

# Is Your Educator Workforce Thriving?
BloomBoard is a talent development provider that helps school districts with educator pipeline, advancement, and retention solutions. We offer turnkey programs to move educators forward at all points of their professional journey—from becoming a teacher’s aide to a school leader.
[Let's Talk!](http://www.bloomboard.com/<#contact-us>)
### Why It’s Important
## Your Teachers Are Your Future
**Many teacher education programs are expensive, time-consuming, and not relevant to classroom practice. We’re changing that by connecting school districts to higher education institutions to create opportunity for all teachers at every level, and it all starts with****our unique on-the-job learning approach.**
![Talent Development](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/talent-development_bloomboard.png)
### School Districts
**Preparation, promotion, and salary advancement for every educator, at every level of your org**
[Learn More](http://www.bloomboard.com/<https:/bloomboard.com/bb-district-solutions/>)
![higher-education-partners](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/higher-education-partners.png)
### Higher Education Institutions
**Ready-made, innovative distance learning degree and certification programs you can make your own**
[FIND OUT HOW](http://www.bloomboard.com/<https:/bloomboard.com/bb-for-learning-providers-partner-programs>)
### Who is BloomBoard
## We’re Here to Help You Solve Your Teacher Shortage
BloomBoard’s turnkey talent development solutions for school districts prepare, promote, and advance educators at all points in their professional journey. Watch the video below to learn more or read through some of our **[success stories](http://www.bloomboard.com/<https:/bloomboard.com/success-stories/>)**. 
[](http://www.bloomboard.com/<#>)
### How it Works
## **Turn your existing teacher support efforts and funding into your own district-branded “University”**
We will assess your district’s needs, then design and implement a “Your-District U” branded program. The program will connect your educators to higher education institutions that offer unique, on-the-job certification and degree options for their specific needs and goals.
#### On-the-Job
A unique portfolio-based, coaching-supported learning approach that allows your teachers to earn accredited degrees and certifications by showing what they know in their classroom practice.
#### Purpose-Based Learning
Meaningful, measurable growth in teacher classroom practice and linkages to salary and career advancement via accredited degrees and state certifications.
#### Turnkey Program Implementation
Program design, recruitment, implementation, and recognition to honor your educators and their work, while elevating their careers. 
### ![Hernando Logo](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/hcsd-logo.png)
## School District in Action
Hear how Florida-based Hernando School District is partnering with BloomBoard to address the teacher pipeline and retention crisis by offering on-the-job education degrees. 
[Connect with Us](http://www.bloomboard.com/<#contact-us>)
### By the Numbers
## BloomBoard drives real outcomes for your teachers and your district
When you provide meaningful development and advancement opportunities for your teachers, it becomes your competitive advantage. BloomBoard helps you support teacher development and improve classroom effectiveness.
![positive-impact-learning](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/Positive-Impact.png)
### **87%**
of educators indicated that BloomBoard’s learning model has had a positive impact on their practice as an educator.
![valuable-coaching-support](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/valuable-coaching-support.png)
###  90%
of educators found our coaching support valuable or extremely valuable.
![Funds](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/valuable-assessor-feedback.png)
### **87%**
of educators found the assessor feedback provided through BloomBoard valuable or extremely valuable.
### In their Words
## **Education Changes Lives**
See firsthand how BloomBoard has made a real difference for both teachers and their school districts.
![Victoria Hansen review](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/Devon-Horton2.png)
#### Dr. Devon Horton, Superintendent, DeKalb Co. Schools, Georgia
“By providing accessible professional growth opportunities for your staff, you’re not only elevating and advancing your existing educators, you’re becoming an employer of choice to attract more high-quality, dedicated teachers.”
![Lisa Stanley feedback](https://bloomboard.com/wp-content/uploads/Rovel-Pollock.png)
#### Dr. Rovel Pollock, Director of HR, Valley View Schools, Illinois
“In order for us to advance educational outcomes for students, we have to invest in the adults we are putting in front of students. At Valley View, we recognize the power of mentorship, professional development, and coaching. And so, we’ve invested in this program to grow our educators.“
## Are you ready to create meaningful professional learningand advancement opportunities for your teachers?
Schedule time to talk with one of our experts to learn how BloomBoard can help your school district create a sustainable educator pipeline and a thriving workforce that will flourish in your district.

**Company Overview: BloomBoard**

Founded in 2010 and part of the Y Combinator Batch IK12, BloomBoard is a pioneering micro-credentialing platform based in Pittsburgh, PA. With a team of 56 passionate employees, BloomBoard is at the forefront of transforming professional development into career advancement through innovative micro-certification programs.

**Mission**  
BloomBoard's core mission is to enable meaningful, purpose-driven professional learning through measurable certifications. The company collaborates with states, school districts, and employers to create unique online learning experiences, helping individuals enhance their job-related skills and progress in their careers.

**What They Do**  
BloomBoard facilitates the entire range of educator development—preparation, promotion, and retention. Their approach includes turnkey programs designed to support educators at various stages of their professional paths, from Teacher’s Aide to School Leader. They emphasize on-the-job learning and meaningful growth by linking educational experiences with tangible career advancements.

**Key Offerings**  
- **For School Districts**: They offer comprehensive solutions aimed at building sustainable educator pipelines. By connecting schools to higher education institutions, BloomBoard creates opportunities for continuous professional growth.
  
- **For Higher Education Institutions**: BloomBoard provides ready-made, distance learning degree and certification programs, customized for district needs, enhancing collaboration in education.

**Success Metrics**  
BloomBoard’s impact is clear: 87% of educators report that BloomBoard's learning model enhances their effectiveness, while 90% appreciate the coaching support provided. This solid feedback underscores their commitment to meaningful professional development.

**Connect with BloomBoard**  
For more in-depth insights and interaction, organizations can visit their website at [bloomboard.com](http://www.bloomboard.com) where they can explore various resources, success stories, and partnership opportunities.

In a nutshell, BloomBoard is reshaping how educators develop professionally, ensuring that the workforce not only thrives but evolves in alignment with the demands of education today. If you're involved in education—be it as a district leader or as a teacher—BloomBoard might just be the strategic partner you've been looking for.
